title: DashingAgent
author: DashingAgent
created_time: November 06, 2023, 05:45:15 AMLast edit: November 06, 2023, 05:57:47 AM by DashingAgent
content: Trade Supreme Finance HYPES token on MEXC - 5 billion total supply Trade Supreme Finance HYPES token currently listed on MEXC is a low cap gem, it is to be noted that HYPE is currently swapped to HYPES so the token listed on HTX is a different one. There is currently no price prediction of this token.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: DashingAgent on November 06, 2023, 05:45:15 AMThere is currently no price prediction of this token.You're right, "There is currently no price prediction of this token." because it is a token with no utility, no product, no userbase, no reputation, no history, no volume, with a very low rating on CMC (2.8/5), and is traded on a small exchange with zero liquidity where it is better not to put your money. definitely not worth a single dollar of investment.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: DashingAgent on November 06, 2023, 05:45:15 AMTrade Supreme Finance HYPES token currently listed on MEXC is a low cap gem, it is to be noted that HYPE is currently swapped to HYPES so the token listed on HTX is a different one. There is currently no price prediction of this token.How do you bring up both of those two different bolded sentence parts in one paragraph? Don't you see that you are contradicting yourself? The HYPES token simply a pump and dump token and once it starts dumping, it will be endless until there is no more volume, delisted from the platforms and completely dead.I mean, look at the chart of this token... you really think it's going to miraculously resurrect?

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: DashingAgent on November 06, 2023, 05:45:15 AMTrade Supreme Finance HYPES token on MEXC - 5 billion total supply Trade Supreme Finance HYPES token currently listed on MEXC is a low cap gem, it is to be noted that HYPE is currently swapped to HYPES so the token listed on HTX is a different one. There is currently no price prediction for this token.Buddy, it's not wise to recommend anyone an asset to trade with to anyone, there are a lot of such coins and tokens with better or worse tokenomics but their overall potential is zero. supply can not be considered as the only point to consider a token/coin tradeable.To ensure safety better to study the project its vision their potential, and then study its fundamentals after making these necessary prerequisites you should analyze the community's strengths and sentiments, after all this you are ready to go.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on November 09, 2023, 09:48:23 PMHow do you bring up both of those two different bolded sentence parts in one paragraph? Don't you see that you are contradicting yourself? The HYPES token simply a pump and dump token and once it starts dumping, it will be endless until there is no more volume, delisted from the platforms and completely dead.I mean, look at the chart of this token... you really think it's going to miraculously resurrect?I think he is trying to say that this token will be pumped soon so it is a golden opportunity because it will be listed on HTX.I do not think that the premise of investing in his currency is dead because it will be listed on another platform and thus a golden opportunity for investment is a wrong conclusion. Anyone who wants to think about this should make sure that this currency will be listed in HTX before making any decision
